title: "Microsoft Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)"
excerpt: "Azure AD uses continuously evolving algorithms and global threat intelligence to build a profile for each end-user. The machine learning engine then leverages dynamic learning to understand a baseline of sign-in properties and behaviors so that the system recognizes and flags only anomalous activity. Conditional access rules heighten security ..."
